metadata.name: Summer Lovin' - 01
metadata.description:
"Summer Lovin'" is my genesis NFT photography collection. It is a special body of work that I made during the summers of 2017 through 2019.

Each of these images began with a candid exploration until eye contact was made and a conversation ensued. 

My Summer Lovin’ series focuses on the love shared between couples. I chose to photograph couples at two distinct beaches in the largest cities in America - New York City’s Coney Island Beach in Brooklyn and Venice Beach in Los Angeles.  

"Summer Lovin' - 01" is my favorite photograph I have ever made.
